name: The Shiny Ones
description:
The Shiny Ones is a tower defense game that puts emphasis on road building and characters healing. Play as one of the mages, transmuting crystals into elements and take down those evil viruses. The balance of the galaxy is in your hands.

Hope you enjoy the game. Let me know what you think of it ;)

Huge thanks to Edward K. Stuart for the music. Check his page out: https://edwardkstuart.bandcamp.com/releases
